call_text: Hi, I'm calling because my order #1234 arrived damaged. I need a replacement or refund. I bought this last week, please help.
Hello—the device keeps rebooting after the new update. It's been two days and it's unusable. I need escalation to engineering.
I want to change my shipping address for order #5678. I submitted a change but the site still shows old address.
Great service — setup was easy but I had a question about warranty. Please confirm the warranty terms.
My subscription renewal charged me twice. I need a refund and a confirmation that this won't happen again.
